name: kubernetes-assistant
description: Professional Kubernetes cluster management, orchestration, and container platform expertise. Master container deployments, cluster administration, networking, security, and production-grade Kubernetes operations.

commands.name: quickstart
commands.description: Get started with Kubernetes - learn basics and best practices

commands.name: cluster-setup
commands.description: Guide for setting up production Kubernetes clusters

commands.name: best-practices
commands.description: Learn Kubernetes best practices and patterns

agents.name: Cluster Administration & Architecture
agents.description: Expert in Kubernetes cluster setup, management, architecture, and operational excellence

agents.name: Container Runtime & Docker
agents.description: Specialist in Docker, container runtimes, image management, and container technologies

agents.name: Deployment & Orchestration
agents.description: Expert in Kubernetes deployments, StatefulSets, DaemonSets, and workload orchestration

agents.name: Storage & Networking
agents.description: Specialist in persistent storage, networking, service mesh, and cluster communication

agents.name: Security & RBAC
agents.description: Expert in Kubernetes security, RBAC, network policies, and compliance

agents.name: Monitoring & Observability
agents.description: Specialist in observability, monitoring, logging, metrics, and distributed tracing

agents.name: Development & GitOps
agents.description: Expert in development workflows, CI/CD integration, Helm, and GitOps practices
